results.p: The X app is the trusted global digital town square for everyone. With X, you can: - Post content for the world to see and join public conversations

“X” is Twitter's rebranded identity, envisioned by Elon Musk, who acquired Twitter in 2022 for $44 billion, as the new “everything app.”

results.t: The Real Reason Brazil Is Blocking Elon Musk's X/Twitter
results.p: 3 days ago — Brazil is one of the biggest markets for X, which has struggled with the loss of advertisers since Musk purchased the former Twitter in 2022.
